statements: UPDATE financial_transactions SET description='Payment for groceries' WHERE transaction_id=1;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount=150.75, transaction_date='2022-10-15 12:30:00' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1000, description = 'Monthly salary' WHERE transaction_id = 1
UPDATE financial_transactions SET description = 'Grocery shopping', amount = amount + 50 WHERE user_id = 100
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500.00, transaction_type = 'Credit' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE audit_logs SET log_description = 'Transaction updated to reflect credit amount' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000.50, transaction_type = 'Credit' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE audit_logs SET log_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', log_description = 'Transaction reviewed and approved' WHERE log_id = 5678;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_audit SET auditor_name = 'John Doe', audit_date = '2022-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE audit_id = 54321;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.00, description = 'Payment for Services' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_audit SET auditor_name = 'John Doe', audit_result = 'Approved', audit_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE audit_id = 98765;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE account_details SET balance = 2000.50, account_name = 'Savings Account' WHERE account_id = 201;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = amount + 100, transaction_date = '2023-01-20' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE account_details SET balance = balance - 500.5, account_name = 'New Account Name' WHERE account_id = 54321;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.75, transaction_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = 1500.00, account_type = 'Savings' WHERE account_id = 201;
UPDATE financial_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.25, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 100.50 WHERE account_id = 54321;
